question: What is the India's rank in the world for the number of MPs in Parliament, as per latest UN report "Women in Politics 2017 Map"?
explanation: India has been ranked 148th out of 193 countries in the world for the number of women MPs  in Parliament, according to the 2017 edition of “Women in Politics 2017 Map” published by the Inter-Parliamentary Union (IPU) and UN Women. Rwanda topped the list, followed by Bolivia, Cuba, Iceland, Nicaragua and Sweden.  The map of Women in Politics not only provides a country ranking for both ministerial and parliamentary representation, but also statistics on women in political leadership positions – Heads of State or government, women Speakers of Parliament, as well as ministerial portfolios held by women throughout the world.
